title: Appearance of Masteries
body:
Would it be possible to thicken the border around the Masteries that have been selected? See the before/after mockups below. The thicker green border would indicate partial points in a selected Mastery, while the thicker gold border would indicate that a Mastery has been maxed. 

Before:
http://puu.sh/hSxLX.png

After:
http://puu.sh/hSxAK.png

replies.body: They could also probably redo the artwork in the background for them. All of them are the old chinese artwork for Ashe, Poppy, and Soraka.
Poppy being the defensive tree is quite funny too, considering she's going to run 21 in offense most of the time.
I'd just be happy if they made it to where you could reset mastery points based on tree instead of having to reset all of them. ;.;
I dont see a substantial need for this but I do like the suggestion. Think it would make masteries a little easier to grasp.
would make it easier to see if something was out of place for sure

I like how the defense tree has the Korean client's Poppy splash Art, but we are stuck with the ugly NA version.

Same with irelia. Rito pls
Same ^   it's not that big a deal, but I guess it's an okay idea. Would rather have differet colored borders than thicker borders, though.
an upvote for you my friend
A little too thick I think. But I like the idea
Not a fan. Sorry. I like it the way it is.
will not help. i mean people even fail in champ select and pick nida or lee sin, then proceed to carry enemy team XD
